thread.title: 13 students killed after bus hits electric post in Tanay
thread.title_full: 13 students killed after bus hits electric post in Tanay

title: 13 students killed after bus hits electric post in Tanay
text:
13 students killed after bus hits electric post in Tanay By AJ Bolando   1:08pm 
Students were on their way to a camping site in Tanay, Rizal when they met a tragic incident. 
MANILA, Philippines — What was supposed to be a team building event turned into a nightmare after 13 students killed in an accident in Tanay, Rizal on Monday morning 
According to reports, 10 of the victims died on the spot and three others perished while being treated in the hospital after their tourist bus rammed into an electric post in Barangay Sampaloc in the municipality of Tanay. 
Initial investigation revealed, the tourist bus (TXS 325) under Panda Coach Tourist and Transpo Inc. lost its control while traversing a downhill road of Sitio Bayucal around 8:45 a.m. 
The bus carrying 50 students of Best College of the Philippines abruptly hit an electric post due to fail breaking system. BREAKING: 10 dead in bus accident in Tanay, Rizal. | Photos via @PTVph pic.twitter.com/yTUcefiBNV 
— The Philippine Star (@PhilippineStar) February 20, 2017 Nation ( Article MRec ), pagematch: 1, sectionmatch: 1 
The students, who left their campus around 6 a.m., were on their way to a camping site in Tanay when the incident happened. 
As of posting, other victims are on different hospital receiving treatment, while investigation is still on going. Nation ( Article MRec ), pagematch: 1, sectionmatch: 1
